topic: Review the functionality and interconnected network of this system to ensure it all works smoothly and as it should do, look for errors and propose fixes to guaranty that it works very well
questions: What is the overall architecture and directory structure of this system?
How do the Queen, Scout, Builder, and Watcher ants interact and communicate?
What are the core workflows and data flows between components?
Are there any obvious errors, bugs, or issues in the code that need fixing?
What are the key configuration files and how do they affect system behavior?
